014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.Constable;
017import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
019import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
020
021import java.util.Optional;
022
023import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
024
025/**
026 * A creator of an instance of something.
027 *
028 * @param <I> the type of the instances this {@link Factory} creates
029 *
030 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson/" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
031 */
032@FunctionalInterface
033public interface Factory<I> extends Constable {
034
035  public I create(final Creation<I> c, final ReferenceSelector referenceSelector);
036
037  public default I singleton() {
038    return null;
039  }
040
041  public default boolean destroys() {
042    return true;
043  }
044
045  // MUST be idempotent
046  // If i is an AutoCloseable, MUST be idempotent
047  // autoCloseableRegistry's close() MUST be idempotent
048  public default void destroy(final I i, final AutoCloseable autoCloseableRegistry, final ReferenceSelector referenceSelector) {
049    if (i == null) {
050      return;
051    }
052    final Runnable r = () -> {
053      if (i instanceof AutoCloseable ac) {
054        try {
055          ac.close();
056        } catch (final RuntimeException | Error re) {
057          throw re;
058        } catch (final Exception e) {
059          if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
060            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
061          }
062          throw new DestructionException(e.getMessage(), e);
063        }
064      }
065    };
066    if (autoCloseableRegistry == null) {
067      r.run();
068    } else {
069      try (autoCloseableRegistry) {
070        r.run();
071      } catch (final RuntimeException | Error re) {
072        throw re;
073      } catch (final Exception e) {
074        if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
075          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
076        }
077        throw new DestructionException(e.getMessage(), e);
078      }
079    }
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Returns an {@link Optional} containing the nominal descriptor for this instance, if one can be constructed, or an
084   * {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty <code>Optional</code>} if one cannot be constructed.
085   *
086   * <p>The default implementation of this method returns an {@link Optional} that contains a dynamic constant
087   * representing an invocation of the implementation's constructor that takes no arguments.  <strong>The resolution of
088   * this dynamic constant is undefined if the implementation does not declare such a constructor.</strong></p>
089   *
090   * @return an {@link Optional} containing the nominal descriptor for this instance, if one can be constructed, or an
091   * {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty <code>Optional</code>} if one cannot be constructed
092   *
093   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
094   *
095   * @idempotency This method is neither idempotent nor deterministic.
096   */
097  @Override // Constable
098  public default Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
099    return this.getClass()
100      .describeConstable()
101      .map(classDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
102                                               MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(classDesc)));
103  }
104
105}
